mapper.update: update house h INNER JOIN (SELECT hou_id,COUNT(*) as hou_rom,SUM(dor_num) as hou_peo,SUM(dor_price) as hou_fact FROM dorm GROUP BY hou_id) d on h.hou_id=d.hou_id set h.hou_rom=d.hou_rom,h.hou_peo=d.hou_peo,h.hou_fact=d.hou_fact
update dorm d INNER JOIN (SELECT hou_id,dor_id,COUNT(*) as dor_price FROM riches GROUP BY dor_id) r on d.dor_id=r.dor_id set d.dor_price=r.dor_price
